mapper.select: SELECT * FROM article ORDER BY popularity DESC
SELECT * FROM article ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (board_id, title, content, created_at, popularity, image_url, writer_id, writer_name) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{popularity}, #{imageUrl}, #{writerId}, #{writerName})
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET popularity = popularity - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND popularity > 0
